item.title: The Dark Side of AI: How the Industry Insatiable Appetite for Energy is Fueling a Climate Crisis
item.description:
The Alarming Rate of Data Center Emissions

The rapid growth of artificial intelligence (AI) has been hailed as a revolutionary force, transforming industries and revolutionizing the way we live and work. However, beneath the surface of this technological boom lies a disturbing reality: the AI industry’s insatiable appetite for energy is fueling a climate crisis.

A recent study by researchers at the Harvard T.H. Chan School of Public Health has shed light on the alarming rate at which data center emissions are skyrocketing, and the implications are dire.
